title: Don't Starve Reign of Giants Steam Early Access
description:
Revision 99195:
Webber's beard now grows faster
Webber can craft a spider egg sack
Webber can upgrade spider dens with silk
Spiders that are following Webber will now wait a moment before eating food on the ground
Spiders that are following Webber will no longer attack Chester and Glommer
Spiders will follow Webber properly through wormholes etc
Webber can now sleep in a tent/siesta canopy when neutral or friendly spiders are around (and his own monster-ness is no longer keeping him from sleeper)
Removed Webber's sanity loss on eat monster meat
Taking off the spider hat no longer removes Webber's monster tag, which caused spiders to hate him and pigs to like him
Reduced sanity buff from Glommer (EDIT: this might be a duplicate note from the last update)
Increased delay before Birchnuts transform to their monster mode after cutting down a tall tree
Catcoons raise naughtiness now
Fix some more issues with Glommer and Glommer's Flower getting un-linked
Fix smoldering not getting removed from the world when the entity it was attached to got removed (manifested as a permanently smoldering rabbit hole when the rabbit went inside)
Fix a couple crashes that occurred when auto-saving and when save-and-quitting
Fix crash with Birchnuts changing their leaves (OverrideSymbol crash)
Change Wendy's inspect on Mushtrees to not reference "down there" since they now appear outside of caves
Fix Goose Moose not triggering the epic fight music
Fix mole playing rabbit scream instead of mole death sound when it got cooked on a fire
Fix ice staff being used to extinguish erroneously starting combat music
Fix a crash with pigs that could happen when they were deciding if they should chop a tree
Fix burnt structures and trees being able to start wildfires
Made glommer goop burnable
Fix eyeplants not spreading to deciduous biome ground
Fix burned pig houses spawning pigs on load
Fix a crash in the bee mine
Add "friend gain" sound to Catcoon
Fix character's damage multipliers (for example on Wolfgang and Wigfrid) not functioning properly
Fix rabbit holes being closed outside of Spring and open in Spring
Fashion Melon can now go in the ice box
Fix crash on remove bird from cage
Fix crash when requiring inventoryitem from a modmain
Fix crash when feeding a spider near a spider queen as Webber
Fix a crash in the buzzard with its target not being present when it was trying to hunt it
Fix crash from heat sources (i.e. fires) near frozen things
 
Revision 99231:
Fix food not applying sanity and health benefits/penalties (bug introduced in Revision 99195)
Fix Dragonfly flying sounds not turning off when he dies
Make Dragonfly stay in his angry build when he dies
 
Lastly, a quick note on Webber: he might be super easy now! We're aiming for him to be a fairly average difficulty character that encourages a different play-style and makes different times of day and different biomes more appealing to be active in.

It's latest Don't Starve Reign of Giants update rev.99241 (if you want to check version in game press backspace)
How to play?
1) Extract game
2) Update your video drivers and DirektX
3) Add Don't Starve folder in antivirus exceptions list (it's false possitive)
4) Delete old saves and options (Optional)
5) Play with admin rights

Save game location:
C:ProgramDataSteamKoipao219740storage(if you dont change settings.ini)
Go to C:UsersVartotojasDocumentsKleiDoNotStarve and open settings.ini file with notepad and change DISABLECLOUD = false to DISABLECLOUD = true
Now your files should be stored in here:
C:Users(username)DocumentsKleiDoNotStarvesave
